name: UFO: Extraterrestrials Platinum
description:
UFO: Extraterrestrials PLATINUM is a turn based sci-fi strategy which includes number of changes and improvements giving a player a new look on the classic game: new alien species, heavy weapon platforms, heavy mortar fire, crash site bombing, unique items, globe UFO swarms, and configurability.

New items to research and produce:
  • Medium combat robots Goliath anf Gladiator
  • Tank Mortar
  • Tank Laser
  • Firing Accuracy Extender
  • Throwing Accuracy Controller
  • Air to ground sliding bombs

New Alien Species
  • Lobotomic
  • Attenuator
  • Hardened Chaser
  • Hardened Attenuator Mark2
  • Lobotomic Spawn

Other New Features
  • Crash site bombing
  • New avatars
  • New alien mental power

Language localizations

Technical improvements
  • 64 bit support
  • Wide screen
